ygData.subject: Re: Hrmmm..
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, how about this, Charm a creature who can only be hit by magic such as a ghoul or wisp and us it to attack giants and griffins.
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, how about this, Charm a creature who can only be hit by magic such as a ghoul or wisp and us it to attack giants and griffins.
